content.title: Day 45 Log
content.body:
We've stockpiled some Terracotta - it should be enough to build the teleporter. Even gathered some extra Clay just in case it needs more than we thought. Going to test it within the hour.
We lost a member today.... can't believe the outbreak got him.
Myself and the last survivor haven't turned yet, so I don't think we're infected - but only time will tell. Either way, we need to leave this planet before it gets any worse.
If anyone's reading this, good luck. The next world may not be so forgiving.
